sub_topic: Prove that every group of order 30 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C30, the dihedral group D15, or the non-abelian group of order 30.
message_1: What is the number of elements in the center of a group of order 30 that is isomorphic to the dihedral group D15?
message_2:
The dihedral group D15 has order 2 * 15 = 30, which matches the given order of the group. The dihedral group Dn consists of symmetries of a regular n-sided polygon, including n rotations and n reflections.

In the dihedral group D15, the center of the group consists of the identity element (the rotation by 0 degrees) and the 180-degree rotation. This is because these are the only two elements that commute with all other elements in the group.

Therefore, the number of elements in the center of a group of order 30 that is isomorphic to the dihedral group D15 is 2.
